name: Twilio Enhancements
description: A module to support Twilio enhancements.  Update REDCap when a participant opts-out using Twilio's advanced Opt-out management.

project-settings.name:
Opt-out Field
Select a field (must be formatted as DATETIME or plain text). When someone opts out, the current timestamp will be saved to this field

Opt-out Field Event
If project is longitudinal, please select the event containing the opt-out field

Opt-out Checkbox
OPTIONAL: Select a checkbox field that will be checked when an opt-out is received and will be cleared when an opt-in is received. NOTE: This assumes the opt-out option is coded as 1.

Opt-out Checkbox Field Event
If project is longitudinal, please select the event containing the opt-out checkbox

Phone Field
Select the field that contains the record's phone number

Phone Field Event
If project is longitudinal, please select the event containing the phone field above

Notification Email Address
(optional) Enter your email address to receive a notifcation when a participant changes their opt-out status

Enable Debug Logging
(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger

system-settings.name: Enable Debug Logging (system-wide)(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger
